reviews.name: Cathy K.
reviews.title: VERY MOISTURIZING
reviews.text: I didn't know how effective the gel cream would be since I was skeptical of the texture, but my sensitive skin loved it and I didn't even break out when I first started using it. Love it!

reviews.name: Aileen R.
reviews.title: REALLY LIGHT AND NOT STICKY.
reviews.text: Really light and not sticky. My skin soaked it right up! I mix it with the green tea products and it helps balance my combo skin.

reviews.name: Cathy K.
reviews.title: Tried the kit since it
reviews.text: Tried the kit since it was my first time trying this product line. So far I really am enjoying it and it gives my skin a smooth and fresh look morning and night!
